item.title: My title was removed by Chassy13
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

sendQuest("@dre@Commands", 8144); //Title clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("@dbl@Welcome to the command list", 8145); sendQuest("@dre@~~~", 8147); sendQuest("@dre@::phat", 8149); sendQuest("@dre@::barrows", 8150); sendQuest("@dre@::tools", 8151); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); } To make more, Copy and paste this:
sendQuest("@dre@::tools", 8151);
and make it:
sendQuest("@dre@::tools", 8152);
etc.

Read full topic

item.title: My title was removed by Chassy13
item.dc:creator: @GrimReapersScythe GrimReapersScythe
item.description:
@GrimReapersScythe wrote:

do you see how each one of them say sendQuest(“your writing here”, 8153); well see that number? 8153. just add this to the end.
sendQuest("::barrows", 8156);
sendQuest("::phats", 8157);
sendQuest("::tools", 8158);

like that and to add more just copy it and change the number to the following number. ex.

sendQuest("::newcommandhere", 8159);

Read full topic

@kirill113 wrote:

how to put it that everyone can see like umm right now its like

sendQuest("@dre@Main Menu", 8144); //Title clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("@dbl@Welcome to shadows Server", 8145); sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@~~~@dbl@", 8147); sendQuest("@dre@You last logged in from @blu@"+IPPart1+"."+IPPart2+"."+IPPart3+"."+IPPart4+" @gre@ "+GetLastLogin(lastlogintime)+" @dre@ days ago.@dbl@", 8149); sendQuest("@dre@Players online: @gre@"+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(), 8150); sendQuest("@blu@===Your pk stats===", 8151); sendQuest("@red@Total Kills - "+killcount, 8152); sendQuest("@red@Pk Points - "+pkpoints, 8153); sendQuest("@red@Death Count - "+deathcount, 8154); sendQuest("@red@===================", 8155); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }
